name: Ragadahn
content:
Ragadahn

The Water Lord

Source The First World, Realm of the Fey pg. 32
Pathfinder Wiki Ragadahn

Details

Alignment CE
Pantheon Eldest
Areas of Concern Linnorms, oceans, spirals
Domains Chaos, Evil, Scalykind, Water
Subdomains Ancestors, Dragon, Oceans, Venom
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Whip
Symbol Blue ouroboros
Sacred Animal(s) Sea snake
Sacred Color(s) Blue

Obedience

Use the tooth of an aquatic animal to scratch a spiral into your skin, while letting a drop of your blood diffuse into a body of water or fall into a bowl of clear water. You gain a +4 sacred bonus on saving throws against the spells, spell-like abilities, and supernatural abilities of creatures with the aquatic or water subtype.

Boons - Fey Obedience

Feysworn

Source The First World, Realm of the Fey pg. 32
1: Water Mastery (Sp) marid's masteryARG 3/day, aboleth's lungARG 2/day, or hydraulic torrentAPG 1/day
2: At Home in Water (Sp) You gain a swim speed of 30 feet. If you already have a swim speed, increase it by 10 feet.
3: Wear the Sea (Sp) You can cast seamantleAPG once per day.

For Followers of Ragadahn

Archetypes

Deepwater Rager (Barbarian), Serpent Herald (Skald)

Feats

Fey Friend

Traits

Shaper of Reality

Unique Spell Rules

Source Legacy of Dragons pg. 31

Cleric/Warpriest

Tail Strike can be prepared as a 4th-level spell

Inquisitor

Tail Strike can be prepared as a 4th-level spell

Oracle

Tail Strike can be prepared as a 4th-level spell
